channel.title: Lars Wirzenius on Nicola Iarocci
channel.description: Recent content in Lars Wirzenius on Nicola Iarocci
channel.copyright: Produced / Written / Maintained by Nicola Iarocci since 2010

item.title: Quoting Lars Wirzenius
item.description:
Take care of yourself. Sleep. Eat. Exercise. Rest. Relax. Take care of other people, as best you can. People are important. Software is just fun.

– Lars Wirzenius, in his noteworthy 40 years of programming
